price: 8. Maar degenen die ongelovig zijn voor hen is de vernietiging en (Allah) zal hun daden in het niets laten verdwijnen.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ فَتَعۡسٗا لَّهُمۡ وَأَضَلَّ أَعۡمَٰلَهُمۡ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna kafarū fataʿsan lahum wa-aḍalla aʿmālahum
translations: and He will cause to be lost
